other_tests.changes_over_time: A subsequent biopsy revealed greater organization of the inflammatory infiltrate and increased lymphocytic clustering consistent with a type 1 leprosy reaction.

other_tests.findings: Borderline lepromatous HD with moderate numbers of bacilli.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A biopsy 1 month later showed increased inflammatory response consistent with a type 1 leprosy reaction.

other_tests.findings: Advanced regression of the lesion with no residual bacilli.
Histopathological features of borderline lepromatous HD.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A biopsy after 6 months of MDT revealed increased organization and decreased extent of inflammation, as well as a reduced bacterial load.

other_tests.findings: Neuropathic changes in all extremities with abnormal compound muscle action potentials and sensory nerve action potentials.
